rows.label: tlk43320242_02_msg0001
rows.name:
A rookie leader, eh... You really gotta
nail down the basics of battle, then.

rows.label: tlk43320242_02_msg0002
rows.name:
If the enemy get the drop on you when
you don't have your weapons drawn,
you're gonna take a lot of damage.

rows.label: tlk43320242_02_msg0003
rows.name:
You wanna be battle-ready. Otherwise,
you'll get bashed up.

rows.label: tlk43320242_02_msg0004
rows.name:
Then you want to watch
out for the ugly mugs out
there that get into a rage.

rows.label: tlk43320242_02_msg0005
rows.name:
If they're all worked up, then things
are gonna be different. So you need to
be on your guard!
